attributes.action: reduce the abortion limit from 24 weeks to 12 weeks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is increasing evidence that an horrifically high number of babies survive abortion (1 in 30 from a recent survey), and that the babies immune system is sufficiently developed to suffer pain by the end of the first trimester. In one case a boy survived three attempts at being aborted!

There are extraordinary circumstances in which a baby should be allowed to be aborted, when the mother's health is at risk or the child is severely handicapped and will not survive anyway.

Social reasons are not to be placed above the suffering of another living being.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
